author: brane
msg: On the svn-auth-x509 branch: Fix ambiguous code.
* subversion/libsvn_subr/x509parse.c
(is_hostname): Make the parameter const to avoid a warning at a call site.
Add braces to a conditional statement that was ambiguous because the
indentation indicated a different intent than the code actually
implmenented.

author: marcus
msg: Added hint to get in contact via L10N mailing list in case of someone wants to help

author: marcus
msg: Fixed wrong value

author: marcus
msg: Change to force a new build

author: brane
msg: On the svn-auth-x509 branch: Change the UTF conversion functions to accept
and return counted strings that contain NUL values.
* subversion/include/private/svn_utf_private.h
(svn_utf__encode_ucs4_string): Update docstring.
(svn_utf__utf16_to_utf8): Return a counted string and require the length
of the source string; and update docs accordingly.
((svn_utf__utf32_to_utf8): Likewise.
* subversion/libsvn_subr/utf.c
(svn_utf__utf16_to_utf8, svn_utf__utf32_to_utf8): update to match
the changed prototype and semantics.
* subversion/tests/libsvn_subr/utf-test.c
(test_utf_conversions): Update tests to match new function semantics.
Add tests for counted strings containing NUL bytes.
